name: Janine Truong
title: Graphic Designer
bio: Hello! I'm Janine, and I'm the graphic designer for Raw Talk Podcast! I am a recent graduate of the University of Toronto, where I did my Masters in the Department of Molecular Genetics. This is my second season with the podcast, and I'm excited to learn interesting new things and share them with you! Outside of the lab and the podcast, you'll find me cycling around the city or exploring new restaurants.
